results.input: I hereby bequeath all my personal property to my children, to be divided equally among them.
results.translation: Unable to translate: I hereby bequeath all my personal property to my children, to be divided equally among them.

results.input: The party of the first part shall indemnify and hold harmless the party of the second part.
results.translation: Unable to translate: The party of the first part shall indemnify and hold harmless the party of the second part.

results.input: Time is of the essence in the performance of all obligations under this Agreement.
results.translation: Deadlines are critical. You must complete every obligation in this agreement on time, and being late counts as a breach of the contract.

results.input: This Agreement shall be binding upon the heirs, successors, and assigns of the parties.
results.translation: This contract still applies to anyone who takes over a party’s rights or obligations—such as their heirs (after death), successors (a new company or owner), or people they transfer the contract to (assigns).

results.input: Any evidence obtained in violation of the Fourth Amendment shall be inadmissible in a criminal prosecution.
results.translation: Evidence that police get by breaking the Fourth Amendment (such as through an illegal search or seizure) cannot be used against someone in a criminal case.

results.input: The defendant has the right to remain silent and to have an attorney present during questioning.
results.translation: Unable to translate: The defendant has the right to remain silent and to have an attorney present during questioning.

results.input: Probable cause must exist before a search warrant may be issued.
results.translation: Unable to translate: Probable cause must exist before a search warrant may be issued.

results.input: The buyer shall obtain title insurance at their own expense and the seller shall deliver a warranty deed at closing.
results.translation: Unable to translate: The buyer shall obtain title insurance at their own expense and the seller shall deliver a warranty deed at closing.

results.input: The grantor hereby conveys to the grantee all right, title, and interest in the above-described property.
results.translation: The person giving the property (the grantor) is transferring all of their ownership rights in the described property to the recipient (the grantee).

results.input: Subject property is sold 'as is' with all faults, latent and patent.
results.translation: The property is being sold exactly as it is now. The seller makes no promises about its condition and won’t fix anything. The buyer accepts all problems—both obvious and hidden—and can’t hold the seller responsible for them after the sale.

results.input: The employee may not be terminated without cause during the initial probationary period.
results.translation: During the initial probation period, the employer can only fire the employee if there is a valid reason. They cannot dismiss the employee for no reason.

results.input: Employee agrees not to disclose any confidential or proprietary information during or after employment.
results.translation: Unable to translate: Employee agrees not to disclose any confidential or proprietary information during or after employment.

results.input: Employer shall provide thirty (30) days written notice prior to any reduction in force.
results.translation: Unable to translate: Employer shall provide thirty (30) days written notice prior to any reduction in force.

results.input: The custodial parent shall have the right to make decisions regarding the child's education, health care, and religious upbringing.
results.translation: The parent who has custody gets to decide the child’s schooling, medical care, and religious upbringing.

results.input: Child support payments shall be made in the amount of $500 per month, due on the first of each month.
results.translation: You must pay $500 in child support every month, and the payment is due on the first day of each month.

results.input: The parties agree to joint legal custody with primary physical custody to the mother.
results.translation: Both parents will share major decision-making for the child, but the child will live mainly with the mother, who has primary physical custody.

results.input: The plaintiff seeks damages for injuries sustained in a car accident caused by the defendant's negligence.
results.translation: Unable to translate: The plaintiff seeks damages for injuries sustained in a car accident caused by the defendant's negligence.

results.input: Defendant breached the duty of care owed to plaintiff, resulting in compensable damages.
results.translation: The defendant didn’t use reasonable care toward the plaintiff, and because of that the plaintiff was harmed and can seek money to cover those losses.

results.input: Upon my death, the trustee shall distribute the remaining assets of the trust to my grandchildren.
results.translation: When I die, the trustee must give whatever is left in the trust to my grandchildren.

results.input: I revoke all prior wills and codicils made by me and declare this to be my last will and testament.
results.translation: Unable to translate: I revoke all prior wills and codicils made by me and declare this to be my last will and testament.
